name: Hippocampus
description: The Hippocampus is a large beast known for its horse-like body and fish-like tail, enabling it to thrive in both water and air environments, with special gills providing fresh air to riders.
memorable: Its unique ability to provide fresh air to riders sets the Hippocampus apart, making it valuable for underwater journeys.
goals: To aid riders in aquatic environments and assert dominance in waters.
relations: Often found alongside aquatic creatures and can serve as a mount for adventurers.
environment: Typically inhabits aquatic environments, such as rivers and oceans.
strengths: Exceptional swimming speed allows for quick evasive maneuvers in water.
weaknesses: Low Armor Class makes it vulnerable to attacks if caught off guard.
attacks: Effective at melee combat with a Bite attack dealing piercing damage and a Tail Slap attack dealing bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Shared Breath allows it to assist comrades by providing fresh air when needed.
senses: Possesses good perception with a score of 13, indicating awareness of surroundings.
additional_information: Can breathe both air and water.
Capable of performing a Rearing Kick to control enemies.
Utilizes Multiattack to strike twice in one turn.
test_queries: beast that helps riders breathe underwater
